title: Google will block all third-party call recording apps on Play Store from May 11
content:
A new Google Play Store policy coming into force is set to block third-party call recording apps from the online storefront from May 11.

moreâ€¦

The post Google will block all third-party call recording apps on Play Store from May 11 appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: A new Google Play Store policy coming into force is set to block third-party call recording apps from the online storefront from May 11.
